languages.text: "Слова Мессии Прерывания давно не звучали //открыто//в публично открытых диапазонах//. Мы почтительно приветствуем вернувшуюся мудрость".
"It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."
languages.original_text: "Слова Мессии Прерывания давно не звучали //открыто//в публично открытых диапазонах//. Мы почтительно приветствуем вернувшуюся мудрость".

traits.locale_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//." We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//." We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「廃絶の救世主の言葉が最後に//公然と//公共の通信帯域で//話題になって随分と経つ。我々は謹んで智慧の帰還を歓迎する」
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: 「廃絶の救世主の言葉が最後に//公然と//公共の通信帯域で//話題になって随分と経つ。我々は謹んで智慧の帰還を歓迎する」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “距‘终结的弥赛亚’上次//公开讲话//在公共波段上进行发言//，已经过了很长时间，我们恭敬地欢迎智慧重归我们身边。”
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: “距‘终结的弥赛亚’上次//公开讲话//在公共波段上进行发言//，已经过了很长时间，我们恭敬地欢迎智慧重归我们身边。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Es ist lange her, seit die Worte des Messias der Unterbrechung zuletzt //offen//über öffentliche Kommunikationskanäle// gesprochen wurden Wir heißen die Rückkehr der Weisheit respektvoll willkommen."
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist lange her, seit die Worte des Messias der Unterbrechung zuletzt //offen//über öffentliche Kommunikationskanäle// gesprochen wurden Wir heißen die Rückkehr der Weisheit respektvoll willkommen."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Cela faisait bien longtemps que la parole du Messie de l'Interruption n'avait pas été proférée //ouvertement//sur les canaux de communication publics//. Nous saluons respectueusement le retour de ses enseignements. »
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: « Cela faisait bien longtemps que la parole du Messie de l'Interruption n'avait pas été proférée //ouvertement//sur les canaux de communication publics//. Nous saluons respectueusement le retour de ses enseignements. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Hacía mucho tiempo que las palabras del Mesías de la Discontinuidad no se pronunciaban //abiertamente//en canales de comunicación públicos//. Acogemos con sumo respeto el regreso de su sabiduría».
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: «Hacía mucho tiempo que las palabras del Mesías de la Discontinuidad no se pronunciaban //abiertamente//en canales de comunicación públicos//. Acogemos con sumo respeto el regreso de su sabiduría».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Bozulum Mesihi'nin sözlerinin //açıkça//kitle iletişim yöntemleri kullanılarak// sarf edilmesinin üzerinden uzun zaman geçti. Bu bilgece sözleri saygıyla karşılarız."
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the words of the Messiah of Discontinuing were last spoken //openly//over public communication bands//. We respectfully welcome wisdom's return."

traits.locale_text: "Devamsızlık Mesihi'nin sözlerinin //açıkça//kitle iletişim yöntemleri kullanılarak// sarf edilmesinin üzerinden uzun zaman geçti. Bu bilgece sözleri saygıyla karşılarız."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
